CmdLine: cd /tmp     && curl -o ioncube.tar.gz http://downloads3.ioncube.com/loader_downloads/ioncube_loaders_lin_x86-64.tar.gz     && tar -xvvzf ioncube.tar.gz     && mv ioncube/ioncube_loader_lin_5.4.so /usr/local/lib/php/extensions/*     && rm -Rf ioncube.tar.gz ioncube     && echo "zend_extension=ioncube_loader_lin_5.4.so" > /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/00_docker-php-ext-ioncube_loader_lin_5.4.ini
Commands.Name: run
